company_info.Company Description: We are the Direct Recruiter for the Hiring Company which is a very big entity in Travel Trade at Gurgaon, Haryana.Preference will be given to candidates from nearby areas.

jd_information.description: You should have minimum of 1 Year hands-on experience in International Air Ticketing. You should have sound knowledge & experience in Galileo & Amadeus. You should have knowledge of making reservations on CRS. Creating PNR split, Queues You should have knowledge of BSP Electronic Ticketing Table, Ticketing Quota System, Issuing & reissuing. You should have sound Knowledge of Airline Fares.- You should be professional, and positive in handling clients. Requirements: Requirements Must be computer literate, familiarity with Microsoft excel, word, and outlook.
